Confirmation of the shooting and protest: The expert verifies that the shooting of Keith Lamont Scott did occur on September 20, 2016, and that it led to protests in Charlotte, North Carolina.
Identification of the fake news source: The expert identifies the Baltimore Gazette as a clickbait fake news site that published the article making the claim about looters losing government benefits.
Lack of credibility of the source: The expert highlights that the Baltimore Gazette is not a real news outlet and is known for publishing fake news to generate advertising revenue.
Absence of official confirmation or codi: The expert points out that the claim made by the fake news article, stating that rioters would permanently lose government benefits, was not backed by any official announcement or legislation.
